customer_message: Can not activate wpbakery or slider revolution?
expected_response: Bundled plugin don't need activation they'll work fully for you regardless of that.. We not allowed to sell their license more info here https://wolfthemes.ticksy.com/article/12629/

title: Font and color not good on elementor

expected_response: Disable Default Colors and Disable Default Fonts. see troubleshooting post https://wolfthemes.ticksy.com/article/20209/

title: Stylesheet is missing
expected_response: Be sure to do NOT install the whole downloaded package but only the theme zip file included. https://wolfthemes.ticksy.com/article/11682/

title: I want to add this feature
customer_message: I want to add this feature?
expected_response: feature isn’t included in the theme by default I do offer customization services for our themes https://wolfthemes.com/services/

title: Wpbakery frontend is missing
expected_response: As specified in the theme description and for technical reasons, some default features like grid and frontend editor are disabled like in most big themes. However, we're working on the frontend editor compatibility.

title: Unclear issue
expected_response: First, be sure that your WordPress installation, theme, and plugins are up-to-date. Please provide the page URL where it occurs, at least screenshots, and/or even better, a temporary login access if possible.
